typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> employees
employees pivot(groupBy(DEPTNO),
	pivotBy(JOB),
	{} = count(EMPNO),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: false) ~> Pivot1
Pivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['emppivot.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
